import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { toAbsoluteUrl } from '../../_helpers/AssetsHelpers'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './css/header.scss'; function Header(props) { const [slug, setSlug] = useState("/"); useEffect(() => { setSlug(window.location.pathname); }, [window.location.pathname]); return (
  • Portfolio
  • Solutions
  • Our Agency
  • Contact Us
); } export default Header;
